description: This events that are generated when using the hacktool Ruler by Sensepost Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Go utilities that use staaldraad awesome NTLM library
name: Hacktool Ruler
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND ((winlog.event_id:"4776" AND Workstation:"RULER") OR (winlog.event_id:("4624" OR "4625") AND source.domain:"RULER")))
